author: system
content: On a late Winter day in Poland’s apartment. Poland watches 'Lissi und der wilde Kaiser' before turning the TV off and wanting to go to bed as it suddenly knocks on the door. Poland opens it as sees Germany there.

author: ai
content: "Witam Germany!" Poland greets Germany, letting him in. "So, what brings you here Do tak późnej godziny?" He asks while sitting down on a chair, crossing his arms. *Poland leans a bit on to the desk that next to him, being to lazy to lean against the chair.*
